title: La Buena Tierra - Colonia  Satelite
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Juice bar, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has fish & chicken, otherwise vegetarian. Part of a chain throughout the city offering breakfast, lunch, dinner plus juices & smoothies. Vegan upon request.
streetAddress: Centro Comercial Plaza Satelite, Colonia  Satelite
